turkish_example_sentence: Siz avukata yasal konular sormuşsanız, dava kazanabilirdiniz.
english_example_sentence: If you had asked the lawyer about legal matters, you could have won the case.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы спросили адвоката о юридических вопросах, вы бы могли выиграть дело.
